body_html: Hey sorry I didn't get that. I thought the dropout was only applied between different LSTM layers, it's not the case? At least this is the standard way to do it. Applying it at each step is kind of a controversial technique.

body: Hey sorry I didn't get that. I thought the dropout was only applied between different LSTM layers, it's not the case? At least this is the standard way to do it. Applying it at each step is kind of a controversial technique.
